dcterms:creator: M. Kachuee
M. M. Kiani
H. Mohammadzade
M. Shabany
dcterms:description: The MIMIC dataset contains continuous PPG signals and the corresponding arterial BP values, used for evaluating performance against AAMI and/or BHS standards.
dcterms:title: MIMIC

dcterms:creator: R. Mieloszyk
et al.
dcterms:description: The Aurora-BP dataset consists of records from multiple sensors/devices including optical PPG, EKG, tonometer, accelerometer, and cuff-based Blood Pressure, collected at rest or during activities.
dcterms:title: Aurora-BP
